skills.name: Crag Splitter
skills.description: The next attack restores 6% of this unit's Max HP and deals 270% ATK as Physical damage to all surrounding ground enemies, with a 30% chance to stun affected targets for 1 second(s)

skills.name: Bloodline of Desecrated Earth
skills.description: Upon skill activation, Mudrock stops attacking and does not take damage for 10 seconds, reducing the movement speed of surrounding enemies by -60%; After this state ends, Mudrock stuns surrounding ground enemies for 5 seconds and gains ATK +140%, reduced attack interval, DEF +80%, and the ability to attack all blocked enemies

talents.name: Ward of the Fertile Soil
talents.description: Every 9 seconds, gains one shield stack (Each stack can block 1 instance of damage; Can have up to 3 stacks, with 1 stack granted immediately when deployed); When a shield is broken, restores 22% <@ba.talpu>(+2%)</> of Max HP

talents.name: Unshakable Solidarity
talents.description: Takes 30% less damage from Sarkaz enemies
